android.car.input

类 CarInputHandlingService

  • java.lang.Object
    • Service
      • android.car.input.CarInputHandlingService

  • public abstract class CarInputHandlingService
extends Service
    A service that is used for handling of input events.

    To extend this class, you must declare the service in your manifest file with the android.car.permission.BIND_CAR_INPUT_SERVICE permission 

     <service android:name=".MyCarInputService"
          android:permission="android.car.permission.BIND_CAR_INPUT_SERVICE">
 </service>

    Also, you will need to register this service in the following configuration file: packages/services/Car/service/res/values/config.xml

    • 嵌套类概要

      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  CarInputHandlingService.InputFilter
      Filter for input events that are handled by custom service.
